entry.title: Sliding, breathing, and bulk phonon modes in ferroelectrics
entry.content:
Here I tried to analiticaly reproduce the phonon spectral function (Fig. 4d) of a 1D-chain model showing some elementary ferroelectric domain wall modes (the nondispersive sliding mode at the lowest energy, the breathing mode at a higher energy, and the dispersive bulk phonon branch) of [Sci. Adv. 3, e1602371 (2017)].

entry.title: Polarization change in CP2K
entry.content:
This small python3 script is about postprocessing of CP2K AIMD output with BEC, for polarization changes during ferroelectric switching under external electric fields.


Example: The abnormal continuous ferroelectric switching (homogeneous) of Pca21-HfO2, via UCP-aN (N = 2, 4) and UCP-b paths[1,2]. This figure is plotted in the general scheme of P-E loop, if it was.
